metadata.title: CVE-2021-39927 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Server side request forgery protections in GitLab CE/EE versions between8.4 and 14.4.4, between 14.5.0 and 14.5.2, and between 14.6.0 and 14.6.1would fail to protect against attacks sending requests to localhost on port80 or 443 if GitLab was configured to run on a port other than 80 or 443

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
